path: 2025/Summer/LOS-120 - Stats for Informed Dec Making/LOS-120 - Week 3/Attachments/Chapter 4 Quiz 3.pdf
text: Quiz 3 Chapter 4 Refer to the table of Titanic stats that you saw in the lesson. As always, show your work. 1) P (live woman) = 2) P (dead girl) = 3) P (boy) = 4) P (dead) = 5) P (live man OR live woman) = 6) P (dead man AND live woman) = NOTE : The dead man is not replaced into the hat after selection. 7) P (girl OR lived) = 8) P (woman/lived) = 9) P (lived/woman) = 10) What percentage of the passengers did not survive the sinking of the Titanic?
